Applications which @@ -147,0 +148,46 @@ + * @implNote The JDK uses locale data from the Unicode Consortium's + * Common Locale Data Repository (CLDR) + * to implement locale-sensitive APIs in the {@code java.util} and + * {@code java.text} packages. This locale data derives the set of locales + * supported by the Java runtime environment. The following table lists the + * version of CLDR used in each JDK release. + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + * + *
